snippet: The state government of Rio de Janeiro, which is feverishly preparing for next year’s Olympic Games, has failed to pay its phone and Internet bills.
abstract: Brazilian phone company Oi cuts off telephone and Internet service to state government of Rio de Janeiro for $55.7 million in unpaid bills.
lead_paragraph: The state government of Rio de Janeiro, which is feverishly preparing for next year’s Olympic Games, has failed to pay its phone and Internet bills.

headline.main: Brazil: Phone and Internet Lines Are Cut for a Delinquent Rio State
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Phone and Internet Lines Are Cut for a Delinquent Rio State
